name: For Dee (early access)
description:
When For Dee is fully released it will no longer be free.

In this early release there are known bugs with paravoxes (the blocks that you can go into)

Controls:

  • Use WASDQE, Shift, and Space to move.
  • Press  Enter to go into place mode
  • Press Backspace to go into break mode
  • Use 1-9, +, and - to navigate your hotbar/inventory
  • Hold control while pressing hotbar/inventory navigation buttons to navigate your secondary hotbar
  • Press V to swap item selected in secondary hotbar with the item selected in the primary hotbar
  • Press B to copy the item in the primary hotbar to the slot in the secondary hotbar
  • Press C to change the color of the selected item in the primary hotbar
  • Press I to go to and from your imagination
  • Press \ to open the game command window (type help and then press Enter to see a list of commands)
  • Press X to set the seconary selected slot to the same slot as the primary selected slot
  • Press P to toggle pushing (when pushing is disabled you will not be able to push pushable blocks)
  • To save and load worlds you must use the game command window.

Installation:

To install, make sure you have version 16 of Java installed. Then extract the files from the zip and run ForDeeEarlyAccess.jar.
